createProfileMsg:
Steps to Register :
1. Please go to the https://proquest-sita.ebiz.verizon.com/operations.
2. Click on Registration and then click on create New Ordering request.
3. Select either MobileSalesUser (Sales) or MobileTechUser (Technician) Role to request access to VRDMobile.
4. You should be able to login once your manager and the trustee approve your request.
emailTechContent:
Verizon is pleased to provide ACME FABRICATION, LLC with a quote for Site Ready services. During a recent site survey, Verizon identified that additional site preparation work at your facilities is required prior to the installation of Verizon's Ethernet service. For an additional charge, Verizon will coordinate, perform and complete this work prior to the scheduled installation of your new Verizon Ethernet service.

Please review the attached quote.

Verizon requests your response within 72 hours by identifying if you want to proceed with ordering Verizon's Site Ready service or if you choose to decline the Site Ready service from Verizon.

To proceed with ordering Verizon's Site Ready service please reply to this email and a Verizon Representative will be in contact with you to initiate a contract. Any technical questions regarding your quote may also be included in your response.

If you do not want the Site Ready service from Verizon, please provide a date when your facilities will be ready. You are still required to have your facilities ready prior to the scheduled installation of Verizon's Ethernet service.

Thank you,

Hitesh

Verizon

anr.title: Advanced Network Retainer
anr.generalDescription: ANR provides a pool of Network PS Sr. Consultant hours, by three different level - Bronze, Silver and Gold. Customer can select one of five possible advanced network technology areas and utilize Verizon Sr. network consultants for a year, without requiring a new SOW. ANR also provides add-on hours with a discounted hourly rate.

bcs.title: Business Connection
bcs.generalDescription: Business Connection is an all-in-one voice, data and Internet solution designed for businesses that want a cost-effective solution to carry voice and data over the same IP network. This service works with any existing Key or PBX System and does not require additional investment in costly infrastructure or desktop equipment. Verizon provides a reliable, business-class solution complete with installation and ongoing maintenance in one package.

attributes.CPE: ADTRAN TA 924e with Vz Installation and Maintenance
ADTRAN TA 924e with Vz Installation and Maintenance
ADTRAN TA 924e with Vz Installation and Maintenance

das.title: Digital Advisory Services
das.generalDescription: This Digital Advisory Services SOW is entered pursuant to the service order form (“SOF”) between the entities identified as, respectively, Verizon and Customer in the SOF executed between Verizon and Customer.Digital Advisory Services provides an initial workshop .Together with any other terms set forth in this SOW, the SOF, the Master Terms, and PSA are hereinafter collectively referred to as the Agreement.

dos.title: DDoS Shield
dos.generalDescription: The DDOS is a new approach to security that creates dynamically provisioned, “virtually air-gapped networks” anywhere in the world. An air-gapped network is one that is completely isolated from all unsecured networks, and which, therefore, mitigates network-based attacks.

int.title: Internet
int.generalDescription: Internet solution is designed for businesses that need of a cost-effective solution to carry voice and data over the same IP network. This service works with any existing Key or PBX System and does not require additional investment in costly infrastructure or desktop equipment.

Customer is not willing to pay NRC

pip.title: Private IP
pip.generalDescription: Private IP solutions offer the scalability and connectivity of IP with the security and reliability of legacy network technologies. Private IP uses a simple network design that grows with your business and consolidates your applications onto a single network infrastructure.

rrr.title: Rapid Response Retainer
generalDescription: Rapid Response Retainer customers benefit from:

sci.title: Secure Cloud Interconnect
sci.generalDescription: Secure Cloud Interconnect enables Verizon Private IP (Rapid Delivery) customers to connect to a global ecosystem of cloud providers and applications. Secure Cloud Interconnect allows for easy provisioning and integration of customer wide area networks (WAN) to cloud services using the Verizon Enterprise Center (VEC).

sdp.title: Software Defined Perimeter
sdp.generalDescription: The Software Defined Perimeter (SDP) is a new approach to security that creates dynamically provisioned, “virtually air-gapped networks” anywhere in the world. An air-gapped network is one that is completely isolated from all unsecured networks, and which, therefore, mitigates network-based attacks.

srs.title: Site Ready Services
generalDescription: Site Ready Services is a suite of products and services offered to prepare the customer's site(s) for additional network services, communications infrastructure, and CPE deployment.
Guide customers in selecting the correct product / organization to perform wiring / cabling work.

uss.title: Unified Security Services
uss.generalDescription: Verizon Unified Security Services is a comprehensive, managed security service designed to protect the network edge where IP data comes in and flows out of your organization and works 24 hours a day, 365 days per year providing a unified approach to network edge security. The service can protect MPLS or Internet network circuits provided by Verizon or any other carrier up to a transfer rate of 1 Gbps.

ussc.title: Unified Security Services Cloud
ussc.generalDescription: Verizon Unified Security Services Cloud is a comprehensive, managed security service designed to protect the network edge where IP data comes in and flows out of your organization and works 24 hours a day, 365 days per year providing a unified approach to network edge security. The service can protect MPLS or Internet network circuits provided by Verizon or any other carrier up to a transfer rate of 1 Gbps.

vce.title: Virtual Communications Express
vce.generalDescription: Verizon’s Virtual Communications Express (VCE) is an advanced unified communications service that helps your business become more efficient and productive while helping you control costs. Get the latest productivity features with no large capex investment all delivered via the cloud.   VCE gives you the same great features in the office, on the move or in the home office.  Just buy and use what you need when you need it.  VCE scales easily from the small business to the large enterprise.

vns.title: Virtual Network Services
vns.generalDescription: Verizon Virtual Network Services is a comprehensive suite of the next generation Software Defined Network Services that enables enterprise customers to replace appliance-based equipment to provide significant total cost of ownership and time-to-market advantages.  Virtual Network Services such as SD-WAN, Security, WAN Optimization, and others are globally available and can be deployed on a Customer Premise using Universal Customer Premise Equipment (uCPE) or in Verizon’s Telco Grade Data Centers for a Cloud based deployment.
